pkgmetadata.longdescription: Goodness-of-Fit Tests in High-Dimensional GLMs // Methodology for testing nonlinearity in the conditional mean function in low- or high-dimensional generalized linear models, and the significance of (potentially large) groups of predictors. Details on the algorithms can be found in the paper by Jankova, Shah, Buehlmann and Samworth (2019) arXiv:1908.03606.
